channel.title: Help me! changed something with xp in cb! how to change?
channel.description:
i changed the xp rate to 1. xp and know if i hit its 4xp if u hit 1 :eek: and i lost the topic on how to change the xp rate from attack/str/defence to more
could someone say me what to search for
[Please do not offer rep as a incentive - BobDole81]

item.title: Help me! changed something with xp in cb! how to change?
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

well let me say something anything in this thing isnt what i was searching for im not dumb!!!

if u think im a noob? im not i was searching for this

TotalExp = (double)(50 * hitDiff);

there was standing 1 * know i changed it to 50 * so now if i hit any monster i get 50xp if i hit 1 if i hit 10 i get 500xp u get it?

[br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2007, 05:11:15 AM[/size][hr]fixd all items with xp gonna fix fishing xD

item.title: Help me! changed something with xp in cb! how to change?
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

well this is really getting weird!!!

i placed a object somewhere added this code

case 1531: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You start hitting the door"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[3), 3); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

but it doesnt give xp i used global objects

Read full topic
item.source: Help me! changed something with xp in cb! how to change?

item.title: Help me! changed something with xp in cb! how to change?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

Purpose: Title says all

Difficulty: 2

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and Pasting

Server Base: PimpScape

Classes Modified: client.java

Procedure
Step 1:
Strength
Search for

case 1531

It should look like this

case 1531: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You start hitting the door"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((600*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

Change the 600 for Strength Exp
and 300 for Slayer Exp

Step 2:
Defense
Search for

case 299

and Change the 600 for Defense
300 for Hp and 150 for Slayer

Step 3:
Attack
Search for

case 823

and Change the numbers 600 for Attack
300 for Hp and 150 for Slayer

Step 4:
Range
Search for

case 2514

You should see

case 2514: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You shoot at the target."); actionName = "range1"; actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(426); addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[18]), 18); addItem(3272, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
Change the 15 exp for Range and the 5 exp for Slayer
Also change the 3272 to the item id you want the target to give you

Step 5:
Magic (Teleport)
Search for this void

public void TeleTo

You should see something like this

[code]public void TeleTo(String s, int level)
{
teleX = absX;
teleY = absY;
newheightLevel = heightLevel;
checkwildy();
if(teleblock == false && actionTimer <= 7)
{
if (s == “Varrock”)
{
teleX = 3210;
teleY = 3424;
addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[6]), 6);
newheightLevel = 0;
}

 if (s == "Falador")
 {
    teleX = 2964;
    teleY = 3378;
    addSkillXP((30*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
         
 }

 if (s == "Lumby")
 {
    teleX = 3222;
    teleY = 3218;
    addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Camelot")
 {
    teleX = 2757;
    teleY = 3477;
   addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ardougne")
 {
    teleX = 2662;
    teleY = 3305;
    addSkillXP((120*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Watchtower")
 {
    teleX = 2549;
    teleY = 3113;
    addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
    
 }

 if (s == "Trollheim")
 {
    teleX = 2480;
    teleY = 5174;
    addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

 if (s == "Ape")
 {
    teleX = 2761;
    teleY = 2784;
    addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[6]), 6);
    newheightLevel = 1;
 }
if (s == "Paddewwa"){

    teleX = 3131; 
    teleY = 9912;
    addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Senntisten”){

    teleX = 3312; 
    teleY = 3376;
    addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Kharyrll”){

    teleX = 3493; 
    teleY = 3485;
    addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Lasaar"){

    teleX = 3007; 
    teleY = 3477;
    addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }
if (s == "Carrallangar"){

    teleX = 3161; 
    teleY = 3671;
    addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Annakarl”){

    teleX = 3288; 
    teleY = 3886;
    addSkillXP((550*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

if (s == “Ghorrock”){

    teleX = 3091;
    teleY = 3963;
    addSkillXP((650*playerLevel[playerMagic]), playerMagic);
    newheightLevel = 0;
 }

RemoveAllWindows();
closeInterface();
teleport();
actionTimer = 10;
}

else if(teleblock == true)
{
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else if(playerLevel[6] < level)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+level+” to cast this spell.”);
}
else if(inwildy == true)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}

updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
public boolean HasItemAmount(int itemID, int itemAmount) {
int playerItemAmountCount = 0;
for (int i=0; i<playerItems.length; i++)
{
if (playerItems[i] == itemID+1)
{
playerItemAmountCount = playerItemsN[i];
}
if(playerItemAmountCount >= itemAmount){
return true;}
}
return false;
}[/code]
Change the exp in it and you’re done.

Step 6:
Prayer
Search for this

case 4830: //Fayrg Bones prayer[2] = 87; break;
Below that case you should see some bones and something

The number after the ‘=’ is the exp the bone gives

Step 7:
Fishing
Search for

public void make(){ if (actionTimer == 0) { addItem(383,1); sendMessage("You catch a shark."); addSkillXP((40*playerLevel[10]), 10); actionName = "make"; actionTimer = 10; pEmote = 0x306; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }
Change the exp you see in it and below this voids theres more to change.
The number after the ‘=’ is the exp the fountain gives.

post if this is waht u wanted and if it was helpful

Read full topic
